= Logs and debug with VEGAS =

== Description ==


The *vegas.logging* package contains the logging classes of *VEGAS*.

Can the Logging model of VEGAS you can use the [http://sos.powerflasher.de/english/english.html SOS console], the [http://www.luminicbox.com/blog/?page=post&id=2 LuminicBox FlashInspector], [https://addons.mozilla.org/fr/firefox/addon/1843 FireBug] console, etc. 

The AS2, AS3, SSAS versions of the VEGAS logging model use a polymorphism with mx.logging package in AS3 framework.
